column5: Great work done by a dedicated few, trucking 1,000 Rainbow from Southampton to West & North of Hanover, fishing is only going to get better on the Saugeen, they are moving about 40% clipped Rainbow from the Lake Huron Fishing Club & that is great to see Thanx Ontario Steelheaders & their Volunteers Tight Lines Richard
Sweet, I'll have get out, spend some money locally and catch some saugeen rainbows one of these  days!
Great job guy's. I grew up in Hanover and can remember the ontario steelheaders doing the same thing 25 years ago.
It is always great to see a dedicated group of fishermen helping the fish we all love to catch.
